column4: So i just installed ubuntu on one of our servers and all I have are random specs of colors
does not happen with the livecd i guess?
it has nvidia cards in it
if its not even working there, then its about the installation/setup itself
try with knoppix as well. if it does not work in knoppix, it wont work anywhere
ive used this cd on 5 other machines
thats a rescue livecd it has the best hardware detection i know of
if knoppix does not work properly for you its definitley a hardware issue...
